title: The mouth watering new recipe: Pulled Pork Nachos.
description: Goruden Singapore introduces its new menu, which will be available on 17 Dec 2016. The mouth watering new recipe: Pulled Pork Nachos. From sweet to superbly savory, nachos will be taken to a new level at our outlet. Through the holiday seasons, our chef will prepare three different types of sauces served in homemade pulled pork for a warm and hearty option. They will include cheesy cheese, wasabi mayo and garlic mayo. For those who prefer a healthier alternative, our nachos are can be served in lettuce fillings.
address: Yusof Ishak House, Central Square Level 2, 31 Lower Kent Ridge Road Singapore 119078 Lower Kent Ridge Rd, Singapore 119078

title: CRYSTAL JADE KITCHEN
description: $11.80 Weekday Value Lunch Set (U.P $17.20) – Enjoy 1 Main + 1 Appetiser of your choice (Half Portion). Featuring our Roast Meat Rice or Noodle selection, Hong Kong Noodle and more! Complete your meal with drinks at $2 or soup of the day at $3.80 only!
address: 3155 Commonwealth Ave W, #03-20 The Clementi Mall, Singapore 129588
